actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the Secretary of Energy from disbursing financial awards to entities related to the People's Republic of China.
short_title: Supporting American Independence in Innovation Act of 2023

summary.text:
Supporting American Independence in Innovation Act of 2023

This bill prohibits the Department of Energy from disbursing any financial award, such as a grant, to any entity that (1) is in a joint venture with a state-owned enterprise owned by China, or (2) has a board of directors that includes an individual who has participated in a foreign talent recruitment program administered by China.
